title: Vivo Y100
description: Vivo Y100 mobile was launched on 16th February 2023. The phone comes with a 90 Hz refresh rate 6.38-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels (FHD+).

title: Vivo Y22 (2022)
description: Vivo Y22 (2022) mobile was launched on 12th September 2022. The phone comes with a 6.55-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 720x1612 pixels (HD+).

title: Vivo V25 5G
description: Vivo V25 5G mobile was launched on 15th September 2022. The phone comes with a 90 Hz refresh rate 6.44-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1080x2404 pixels (FHD+).

title: Vivo Y15c
description: Vivo Y15c mobile was launched in May 2022. The phone comes with a 60 Hz refresh rate 6.51-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 720x1600 pixels (HD+)

title: Vivo X80
description: The X80 and the X80 Pro (Review) are the latest additions to Vivo's camera-centric flagship X series. We have already reviewed the Vivo X80 Pro and today, we'll be focusing on the X80.

title: Vivo V23e 5G
description: Vivo V23e 5G mobile was launched on 23rd November 2021. The phone comes with a 60 Hz refresh rate 6.44-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1080x2400 pixels and an aspect ratio of 20:9.
